summary: Build a simple romantic interactive Valentine web page (HTML/CSS/JS) with Yes/No options where the No button evades hover and clicking Yes displays a "Good choice" meme image; optimized to run in Chrome on iPad.
architectural_notes: Single-page static web app using HTML/CSS/JavaScript; should run locally in iPad Chrome without backend dependencies.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Meme-style image with the text "Good choice" in a romantic/funny aesthetic (valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page romantic Valentine prompt UI that asks: "Will you be my Valentine?" and shows exactly two options: "Yes" and "No".

Implement an evasive "No" button interaction: when the user tries to hover over or otherwise target the "No" button (pointer enter / mouse move / touch attempt), the button should move to a different position within the visible page area so it cannot be clicked.
When the user clicks "Yes", replace the prompt/buttons with a celebratory view that displays a meme image containing the text: "Good choice".
Apply a consistent romantic visual theme using a pink and white color scheme, with a cohesive, playful style appropriate for a Valentine surprise page.
Add the required generated image(s) as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not fetch images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create romantic Valentine interactive web page with Yes/No buttons; No button moves away on hover; Yes click shows "Good choice" meme image; pink/white theme; runs in Chrome on iPad.

projectName: Romantic Valentine single-page with evasive No button and Yes confirmation meme
